main event: Members of the Ground Observer's Corps in Newcastle sighted a round and flat orange object in the sky.
interesting points: The sighting lasted from 2130 to 2300 CST.,The object was described as round and flat.,Witnesses observed the object disappearing into the distance from east to west.,The report was deemed too incomplete for further interpretation.,Weather conditions were clear during the sighting.
witness description: members of the Ground Observer's Corps
